message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this fantastic product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,500? This is still a great price considering the value of the product.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Could we possibly agree on $10,000?
